paper.title: Discoveries from a Near-infrared Proper Motion Survey Using Multi-epoch Two Micron All-Sky Survey Data
paper.authors: Kirkpatrick, J. Davy; Looper, Dagny L.; Burgasser, Adam J.; Schurr, Steven D.; Cutri, Roc M.; Cushing, Michael C.; Cruz, Kelle L.; Sweet, Anne C.; Knapp, Gillian R.; Barman, Travis S.; Bochanski, John J.; Roellig, Thomas L.; McLean, Ian S.; McGovern, Mark R.; Rice, Emily L.
paper.journal: The Astrophysical Journal Supplement, Volume 190, Issue 1, pp. 100-146 (2010).

paper.title: The Geneva-Copenhagen survey of the solar neighbourhood. III. Improved distances, ages, and kinematics
